jump_scares.spoiler: Anna goes to open a bag when a corpse pops out and slumps to the ground, a few seconds later the corpse’s head turns to face Anna and it says “Don’t go home”
Anna looks through a crack in the door to the boathouse and has a flashback to her mother in bed
There is a metallic clanking noise as the door to Anna’s room is opened
A hand pops out from underneath a blanket
An empty can falls out of the rubbish bag Anna is looking through
Anna looks under the oven and sees a ghostly girl screaming. [Video
Anna walks backwards into a hole in the ground
Rachel appears at the car window as Anna attempts to drive off
Anna has a vision of her mother, but her face suddenly transforms into Rachel’s
Anna opens the rubbish bag and sees Rachel’s dead body
